name: Pollufin
description:
Stop the polluted fish from hurting you! Shoot them to earn score and money. Money can be used to buy health, lane block (lasts 1 stage), and 2x score (lasts 1 stage). Freeze enemies by using your health, preventing you from taking more damage!

Controls:

Movement - Arrow Keys

Shoot - X

Freeze Enemies (Costs 1 Heart) - Z

Made for Mini Jam 109, with the limitation of "Health is a Tool" being used in the freeze ability, using 1 heart in order to freeze all the enemies on the screen. This is my first ever game jam entry.

Made in PICO-8.
